title: 45 arrested for Mirihana Protest
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); 45 people who engaged in the protest on Thursday (31) night in Mirihana, Nugegoda have been arrested by Sri Lanka Police.
Two Police & army buses, a jeep, a three-wheeler, and two motorcycles were damaged, during the protest.
The Police further stated only the residents can travel on the relevant road until further notice.
Sri Lanka : Police Curfew in Colombo lifted after a night of protests
JUST IN: Tear gas and water cannons being fired at protestors
